title: Executive Order 7261-A-Amendment to the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers of the United States
content: The following section is added to Chapter XVI of the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers of the United States:

In the absence of the wife of the head of a diplomatic mission, only the daughter, mother, or sister of the head of the mission or the wife of the counselor or highest ranking secretary (Foreign Service officer), having a wife present at the post may act as hostess for the head of the mission.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7261-A-Amendment to the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers of the United States Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362757
